评论详情: ***HeyNuts***: love it!!! only dislike was the shorter length, it’s as pictured just not as flattering on me! Everything else was great! Would recommend. The strappy back was also my favorite and super flattering and comfortable!  POSHDIVA: this was good but overall my least favorite. so soft and well made, but too high in the armpits and weirdly small circular boob pads (probably fine if you remove them). More of a regular tank top length which I do really like! Would keep if not for the armpits.  Sphinx cat: my favorite of all 4! Love the color and fit, perfect length and not too tight (I sized up to XL on all). Love the material and ribbed texture. non-bra part is definitely thinner but I prefer that for summer! Absolutely love the color too!  The gym people: great material and fit, just shorter than I want - totally a personal preference! Otherwise great buy and would recommend.

I love these types of tops for working out or even wearing casually in the summer. The back straps are so cute and the color is just like the photo. It reaches a perfect length with high waisted shorts that it doesn’t show any stomach unless you raise your arms. The built in bra makes it very comfortable. It isn’t see through and has a bit compression. I don’t have much of a bust and am 5’4” ish. I got my regular size of size small and it fit perfectly. I would buy more of these in more colors. I have many other types of shirts like this and this one is probably my favorite.

I love the softness of the fabric and the overall quality. Picture is true to color. The only issue is the sizing is very inconsistent and the size chart is not accurate at all. I’m 5’7”, 34D, 150 lbs, 28in waist and I usually wear a small in tops. I didn’t want tight compression so ordered a medium. It was still very tight, created bulges under my arms and made me look completely flat chested, so I returned it and ordered a large and it fits perfectly. Length comes to my belly button which is great for high waisted bottoms at the gym. It’s a great top, just make sure you order at least one size up from what the chart recommends unless you like tight compression or have a smaller cup size.

I really loved the material and how soft it was. With it being white I was worried about it being see through but it was not at all. The only thing I don’t love is that the boob pads are too small for the breast area, but I seem to have that issue no matter what I buy and I usually just take them out. I weigh 140, I am wearing a size medium, that is my true size and my bra size is normally a 36F.

In the photo I’m wearing one of my many colors of this tank. THIS BRAND OF TANK TOPS ARE MY FAVORITE!! I CANNOT RECOMMEND THESE ENOUGH! on a less dramatic note, yes I love these. I have repurchased them and currently have one in almost every color! The support these tanks give me is so good and the tightness is so perfect!

I purchased this exercise top in black and was looking forward to receiving it. Upon trying it on, the top was more of a cropped fit than I was expecting. Unless I overlooked the description, I thought I was purchasing a regular length top, which seems to be hard to come by! I am 5ft 6 and the top rested at the top of my hips, showing off my belly button down. Not what I was looking for at all as it would end up riding up and needing adjustment often during an actual workout. If you aren’t bothered by a cropped fit, this top would be a great option as it has a built in bra and is otherwise comfortable. If you are like me and searching for coverage, this top is not for you.  Aside from the length of this top, it fits true to size and the built in bra provides the perfect amount of support.
I love these tanks for every day wear! they are true to size, they’re the perfect length to cover the stomach. the material is super comfortable and the built in bra is just the right size.

This is my favorite brand tank and my favorite style. It’s not a short crop so if you wear high waist shorts your tummy is completely covered. The material is very soft and stretchy and the built in bra is wonderful! It compresses enough to hold the girls in place for a workout but I don’t feel squeezed at all. It’s very comfortable for lounging or hitting the gym. If you have big tatas the built in bra might not be great for running but still great for weightlifting. I’m a D and I run in it comfortably but if they were much bigger I could see that being a problem. I highly recommend this tank..it would even make a great gift. Runs true to size.
I’m glad I sized up because even sizing up it’s a bit small. Washes great and I love the length.
I have a medium from another brand that fits perfectly. This one was very tight. I should have bought a large. Otherwise, very pretty.

I bought a medium and it fits, but might be a bit snug. The bra insert doesn't sit right underneath my chest the way I like it too, but that's probably because I need a larger size.  I think I'm going to order a large and see if it fits better.  Other than that,  it fits perfect everywhere else and isn't tight anywhere else.  Holds me in while I'm working out and is comfortable.  I wear a 36DD and sometimes the medium sport bra's fit, but sometimes they don't.
Fits great, fabric is great and the price is great.

I absolutely love these tops. I ordered it in 6 different colors. Rather it’s the warmer months, and you need a supportive hiking top, or the cooler months and need a supportive top to layer. They are advertised as sports bras, in which they have the support and comfort, but I use it as a top. Plus the removable pads are great for the more modest girlies. I’ve been looking a long time for something long enough to be a crop top, but also covers most of the midriff with any high-wasted pants. For reference, I am 5’8” and 125lbs. I typically wear small tops, Small to Medium sports bra, a 32 DD in V.S, and got a size medium.
I love these workout tops, especially the strappy back. I got the grey and the pink. It has enough support for me to workout. It is slightly cropped but that is how I like my workout tops.

评论概述: I’m not sure I like this
评论详情: I’m 5’3, 135 lbs, 36b cup. I am wearing a large which is my normal sport bra size in the color “carbon dust”.  Carbon dust photos look like a lighter wine tinted khaki but the item sent was darker and more on the yellowish/green tint side of khaki. I don’t like the color sent. That aside, this does have a really supportive built in bra for a b cup, not just little pads, but more support there too. However, the material is not very stretchy. It’s super firm and restrictive, I was surprised by that. When it’s on though it’s okay. Overall I like it for the built in bra and the length and thickness of material but I wish there was more stretch and softer fabric. I’m returning for color issue but I might still buy another color.

This top is AWESOME, but do not order the pink if you are looking for a true pink. I am very sad and will be returning, the top is wonderful quality but if you are looking for pink do not get this top, it's more of a hot orange. Was ordering it to wear with a pair of pink shoes and when adding the pink shoes to the outfit it looked like a clown outfit because the pink was SOOOOOOOOOOO off
Bought two for traveling and hiking, and they are the perfect versatile item. They’re super comfortable, durable, the fabric is soft, and they work great for anything from running to a dinner out.

Great workout top, bought it in a few different colors. It’s a good thickness and is secure to wear for exercise. Love the bright red color. Only complaint is movement of the built in padding, it shifts around when washed.

评论概述: Comfortable, good quality, bra pads show slightly
评论详情: I purchased this to wear with some of my high-waisted pants, and it works really well. The fabric feels expensive and the built in bra is great for yoga, weight-lifting, or errands. It's not quite up to an extended run (I'm a 36D for reference), but is plenty sturdy when I'm chasing kids. :)  The only negative is that the removable bra pads are nude colored and show through a bit. I've removed them temporarily and will probably just replace them with some white ones I have lying around.  Overall, well worth the money.
The length is shorter than the photos make it seem. It’s more like a cami bra than a tank.

This top is really cute and well made - thick material, nice padding and straps are comfy.  It is a crop top and rests about an inch above my belly button - don't be fooled by the models.  On my body, it didn't work because I am high waisted and have enough of a cut in that the tank top creeps up into my waist and becomes just a bra.  If it were a tad longer it might stay down in place on me.  Standing completely still it's very flattering though.  If you are trim and wear high waisted leggings you should try this.  Also, athletic 160 and 36C and a large fit well with a little extra room...I just don't like things super tight.  If you have a smaller bra size get the Medium.  If you have a slightly bigger bra size large will still work for you.

评论用户: It Truly works so fast and so well! I am obsessed and did not have any sensitivity! I will definitely be buying more
评论详情: I would size down one size if you need more support but other than that this tank top is super cute and perfect for any workout or summer top!
Top is very soft and fitting. Only giving 4 stars due to its length. It falls about an inch above belly button

评论概述: Looks so good, feels so good!
评论详情: Amazing top, hugs curvy girls just the right way. Cute colors & affordable. I loved it. I use it for the gym and heavy days.
I ordered a white one and green, white was a little see through and the green was perfect. Also, if you want a looser fit maybe size up. I ordered a size small and it fits pretty tight but i like it

I’m returning because you can see the bra pads, I ordered the white but the pads are beige and you can clearly see the outline. The top is really well made and I love the material though, hopefully I can find one in another color and not worry about the bra pads.

评论概述: Shirt is more cropped than in the photo
评论详情: Great quality. Color as pictured. Much more cropped than expect.

I love the length of the top. I did spend some time during my yoga session pulling it up in the front. It is a great length for a high rise pant that gives you the cropped feeling but you also don't feel like your stomach is hanging out. I was surprised how little the straps dug into my shoulders, especially being larger chested. I would not wear this running but it was super cute under a wide neck sweater.

I really like this top. If I’m doing moderate-level exercise, I wear it on its own. If I’m doing high-intensity, I wear an extra sports bra underneath but I don’t mind this at all. It’s seriously cute and comfortable and I reach for it more than any of my other workout tops. The length is perfect for me (I prefer not to have my stomach show if my arms are down) and sits right at the top of my high-waisted shorts. I’ve gotten several compliments about the cute cross-cross feature in the back. Definitely recommend!

I'm 5'4 130 lb and I ordered a large. It's a little bit loose but I don't like my clothing super tight. A medium probably would have fit. Also. This looks super cute. Because it's a little loose. It's not going to provide a whole lot of support, but for pickleball it's perfect. It does have removable pads but they're comfortable and have good coverage. I ordered two more. I liked it so much.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for!
评论详情: This workout top is exactly what I was looking for! Other workout tops would ride up too high to where they would sit wear a sports bra would which is not the coverage I want when I’m wearing workout tops outside of the gym to run errands or go to class. This top is still cropped, but it falls right at the midpoint of my torso at my belly button so paired with my other workout attire it is perfect! It is also incredibly supportive for the girls!

评论概述: Cute nice looking top, but extremely small.
评论详情: I wear small or x-small, but this is too small to get on.  Go way up on your size!
Overall I really like this workout tank but to me, it runs really small. I’m 5’6” and around 125lbs, usually a small in tank tops but returning to size up for a Med
Unfortunately as a 38I in US bra sizes, the largest size (XL) is slightly too tight. I really wish it came in a bigger option because I otherwise love the material/design.

评论概述: Well made but too short for me
评论详情: This is a good quality workout top with a built in bra, and  it's probably perfect for a younger gal with a cute figure who doesn't mind baring her a little of her bikini body.  For me, it will ride up too much working out, and I'm too self conscious to wear something that will have belly showing.  It's also too long to wear under another work out shirt - you'll be uncomfortably warm to wear both.  Sadly this will be returned

I love this bra/top!! I have it in 3 colors. I’m usually a small, but sized up to a medium and I’m glad I did, in fact I could probably wear a large. This top is perfect to wear with high waisted leggings or shorts if you don’t want much (or any) of your stomach to show. Exactly the fit I want! Buy this top, just size up!

I really wanted to love this top but ended up returning it. I sized up for 32D but it was still too tight in the band and a large would be too loose in the body. I also bought a size Small (32A) for my daughter and even as tiny as she is she said the band was too tight. If they could expand the band size and leave the body width as it is then the top would be a winner.

评论概述: A bit tight, but when it’s on it fits good
评论详情: This was initially a bit harder for me to figure out than a regular bra (or even most sports bras), but it worked out even though it was a bit tight for me!

Good fabric (brushed - it will show sweat), perfect length, good support (for smaller chests). I'm 5'2", 120 pounds, 32C. I purchased 4 different colors in size small, all fit the same (true to size). They have a shelf bra in addition to the removable padding. My favorite thing is that they're a bit longer than my other long line sports bras, so they're more like a cropped tank top. Hits just under my belly button

I absolutely love these crop tops!! It’s been really challenging for me to find a crop top that’s flattering on me. I’ve always felt like it looked like I was wearing a shirt meant for a toddler. I think it’s because I have a longer torso and wider frame. For those reasons, I purchased a large even though I’m normally a size small/medium. I love the crisscross straps in the back and the colors. I ended up order even more colors since I love the style so much. They’re really comfortable to workout in as well.

评论概述: Fit is true to size, nice color
评论详情: Fit is true to size, the blue is a nice vibrant color. It fit well but I think it was a little too cropped for me personally.

评论概述: My go to workout top (more than Lulu)
评论详情: I bought this months ago, and realized it has become my go-to most days.  It is supportive and cute, and the cups hide everything.  I did go with a large as I do with Lulu too (10).  I don't like workout tops that I have to squeeze into and especially, out of, once I am sweaty.  This cutie looks a lot like my favorite Lulu top without the hefty price tag.  And since I am a spray tan devotee in the summer, I don't have to worry about it rubbing off on this top.  I also bought it in white, and just bleach that one when needed.  I am going to be buying this in more colors since I don't wear anything else anymore.  For reference, I am 5'6", 124 lbs and a 36C.  It is not snug, but neither is it too loose.  Just the way I like workout tops to fit.

This top feels like a lululemon dupe. I have a large chest and I feel super secure when wearing it. It is not a full length top stops around your belly button depending on how long of a torso you have. I’ve received so many compliments on this color. I already have more colors on the way. Perfect to wear running errands, casual, or working out. The material is so soft you’ll want to wear it everyday. Great price for the quality.
Have this in many colours. Fits perfectly.

For reference I am an exact 34B/5'4'/118 lbs.The model shown wearing a size small top is said to be a 34B...so based on that I ordered a small.It was so tight I could barely get it on and back off again so definately RUNS SMALL. The quality is actually excellent however and I will be ordering again starting with a medium until I get a comfortable fit.The quality really is so good that if I get a size that fits,I will order several colors.
Good quality material

While the cutest of this product is great, i think my favorite part is that the padding stays in place and I am not constantly finding it in my dryer outside of the tank top, I never even need to adjust it inside of the tank either!  Also as a person who sweats easily, it almost never shows sweat stains. I can do a 1 hour stair master session and my shirt stays pretty dry!

评论概述: Would love a slightly longer version.
评论详情: If you do not have a flat stomach, the bottom of the tank does roll up as it falls at the natural waist line rather than the hips. The overall quality of the item is great though!
It’s really nice! I sized up based on Amazon’s recommendation but I really didn’t need to. Only disappointing thing is that mine came with a stain.
Fits perfectly and very flattering, only issue is the bra cups are see through so I had to remove them.

I originally bought the black, loved it so much have purchased 4 more colors. It’s so comfortable and so flattering! I am 5 2’ 133 lbs, 34DD. I purchased a size medium and it fits perfect. I feel supported enough to workout in these tanks, which is RARE! I wouldn’t say high support for a run, but for a gym workout, they are now the only thing I wear. I also pair them with jeans and Jean shorts. My all around favorite tank top!

评论概述: Love the material and color.. but..
评论详情: I wanted to love this top.  I am 122 lbs, 5 ft 4 and 34DD with implants.  The medium fit in the chest area but around the waist was loose and gaping.  Then I ordered the small but it was too tight around the chest but fit in the waist.  I figured I would just return both and do without.  The material and color and quality were spectacular!!

The length is perfect to wear with high waisted biker/running shorts and not show skin. Great support, I wear it for 5 mile runs. Pads have good coverage can even be worn as a swim top. My mother-in-law tried it on and loved it too

I absolutely love!  I always get compliments when I wear. I purchased the dazzling blue then ordered another in white.  I wear them to work out and also dress with cute capris for lunch out.  I’ve removed the bra pads as well, and fabric is thick, and covers perfect.  Fits really well, very flattering.  Highly recommend.

评论概述: Potential fit difference w/ colors in the same size?
评论详情: I got this top in white and violet verbena, both in XS, and found that the white top seemed to be more comfortable in the bust area than the violet top. Nothing is wrong with the violet top just the band being slightly tighter than the other one. I do love these tops though! Very Lululemon-like and perfect for leisure & workouts. I plan on getting more of these tops in different colors. For Reference: I'm a 32D/26" waist/5'7. I probably could've gotten a size S but wanted to have it fitted to my waist more.

This top is made with quality material, feels great and looks cute. My only complaint is that the red faded a bit after the first wash.  Update, I’ve bought two more. The Cassis color and black. I LOVE these tops.
This is a great dupe! I’m 5’9 139 and got a small and it’s perfect. Supportive and lifting in the chest. This is the exact fabric as the well known brand.
this top is super cute and comfy for the price! I will be getting other colors!

I absolutely love this tank top! It is my go to. I have it in white, black, dusty purple and blue. 2 of them are size small and the other 2 are medium. I switch between them depending on what I’m wearing and what feels more comfort that day. The length is perfect! I have a difficult time finding crop tops that are the right length (I do not like them super cropped) this tank hits right at my belly button. Will definitely be getting more!
Love, love, love!! Waiting for a sale to order more. I wear this too at least 1-2x a week.
I bought two of these and I’m so impressed with the quality! It’s thick and holds up well in the wash. Definitely going to buy more colors!!
Love the top so much I purchased multiple colors! It’s all I wear for working out now. Please please make an olive green one to match the leggings!
Love this top. May need extra support for bigger chested ladies if doing more exercise but I’m very happy with it.

I bought this white tank for the gym and I absolutely love it. The criss-cross back is adorable and the neckline is flattering. I love to pair these tanks with shorts to wear at the gym. I’ve gotten lots of complements on them.

This top was great. I’m super happy I got it. It is very supportive in the bust area. At first I thought it would be too small, but it fit perfectly. My only complaint is that it is a few inches shorter than I would like, but I took a gamble on it. I think it is still wearable for me personally . It comes to about the bellybutton.
I could wear this tank every day. It’s so comfy. Great support and cute back.

It’s a bit snug to get on but it holds everything in. Long enough to hit the top of my high waisted leggings and shorts but still has a cute cropped look. I got an XS and it fit well. I’m a 30d/dd depending on brand.
Very cute. Great material as well. I expected the shirt to be a little longer from the pictures

It is not see through and is very supportive. The only thing that bothers me is the bottom rides up a bit when sitting and moving so I found myself having to pull it down more often then I would have liked.

I’ve been on the hunt for a perfect cropped , but not too cropped shirt to wear with my leggings. This one is the perfect length. I am 5’3” , 120lb, size 34C and the small fits great. I originally ordered Medium and the band was way too loose. The band on the small is a tad tight but not suffocating. The removable pads are a weird round shape but I just took them out. I’ll definitely order more colors :)
Its a good fit but gives strong bathing suit vibes with the material they used. Cup liners are very easily visible as well
Great quality thick fabric and it fits great. I bought two colors but will be buying more. It has the perfect level of support for Pilates/every day wear. The fabric is on par with Lulu, etc.

This bra top is the one!! Just buy it! I ordered 3 bra tops off Amazon and this was hands down my favorite, the most comfortable as well as the most supportive of the 3. Yes, size up! Im usually a S/M in tops and a 34B bra, and I ordered a Large and it fits perfect. If you have a large chest (like maybe a D cup and up) Id suggest maybe sizing up twice. The cup pads in the Large I have dont seem like they would cover more than a larger C cup. However its super supportive and comfortable at the same time so it works out perfect for others who may be small-medium chested. My favorite part is that this top stays far away from my armpits. All the other bra tops I order seem to be too small in the arm holes but this one sits a little lower below the armpits. This makes for super comfortable workouts and some airing out space. The violet color is gorgeous - just like the photo. And it isnt see through at all! Ill be back to order more.
Excelente material Fresh Runs a litle bit smaller.

I was unsure if I would like this because of the Chris cross back straps but I love it!! Perfect lulu dupe! Nice exercise material and built in bra! I have a more athletic build with a smaller chest it gave me a little lift and Perfect amount of support for me! I’m about to order more in other colors!
I ended up buying 3 of these and I love the fit and they are perfect!  Size is right and they are not too short or too long!  Love them!
Nice style but too small. I’m 30C,  and I bought xs based on the chart. But this tank is very tight on me
I like the fit of this top. No gaps and comes to my waist, so not real short. I wear this in place of a bra. Ordered a few more.
I am sure it is my body type (longer torso) but this still crept up my tummy. Too tight and not long enough. I wear xl and ordered xl

I really like this crop workout top. It's flattering for the ladies with medium support. I have a very long torso and usually crop tops leave me uncomfortably exposed. This one is longer than most! I felt adequately covered but definitely still a crop with a peak of skin.  I'm 5'9" 29 waist, 34B and size medium fit me very well.

It’s hard to find workout tops with non-removable cups, so I decided to take a chance on these since the reviews were good. I was pleasantly surprised by them! I really like the construction and material of these tops. Even though the cups are removable, they stay in place once you adjust them and they don’t have obvious outlines. I wear these tops on their own without an additional sports bra underneath and feel well-supported during all types of workouts, from high intensity training with jumping to Pilates and everything in between, though I’m not particularly busty. There is a shelf, so I imagine it might be a tight fit or too uncomfortable to wear a sports bra underneath unless you size up. I just don’t like the feeling of two bands around my ribs. These are now a staple in my gym wardrobe and are cute paired with high waisted pants outside of the gym!

I like this long line bra. I purchased my size but found it too tight so went up a size. It does tend to hold my chest tightly which is great for exercising. I love the color I got and I will get a lot of use out of it. It does tend to make a uniboob but not as noticeable as some other sports bras I’ve tried. I love the length, hits just at belly button.

This top is adorable!! It’s super soft and feels almost like a high end product like Lulu. I am a true medium on top and this was very tight around the chest area. I never have an issue with the fit around the boob area with built in bra tops and this had me looking like a stuffed sausage with my side boob popping out 😂 however, aside from that I can tell it’s a fantastic product and built well. I will be ordering a large (I’m 5’3’’ and a 36 C for reference).

This is even cuter than the picture, I got the royal blue color! It's a good length, not too cropped. I am 5'6" 140 lbs and normally wear small to medium, initially ordered a large based on recommendations from other reviewers. The large was too big so I exchanged for the medium, which is a perfect fit! I would say order your true size unless you're kind of between sizes, then I would pick the bigger size of the two.

评论概述: LOVE this for a short torso!
评论详情: This was the perfect length and support for me (5ft, 34D)! The color is bright and beautiful and I received several compliments. I felt comfortable enough in this to wear with athletic shorts to a festival with my children. Not too revealing, not overly modest, and perfect for hot days outside.
Descent support, but runs small. In the lighter colors you can see the padding outline. I'll buy again, just sizing up.

I will be buying more colors because I feel amazing in this sports cropped bra. I love it because it is still modest enough but has a little flare to it to make you feel great! Also very soft and comfortable. This bra has held up greta in the gym. I am a size small, 5'2" 120lbs for reference

Absolutely love this top! It’s a great length and not too cropped. Perfect to wear with high waisted short or pants. I did size up to a large because I didn’t want a super tight fit. I’m 5’5 and 155lbs. The fabric is super soft too. Will be ordering more colors!
I absolutely love the length of these. Comfortable, supportive, great true to size fit. I have already bought 2 and wear them ALL THE TIME. Will probably buy more honestly.
Better than expected
Wish it was slightly longer but good quality

I initially purchased a medium and large because I saw only a couple reviews suggesting to size up. I normally wear medium in tops just fine. Normally 36C in Target Auden bras. I am about 29-30 in waist. I kept the large for a more relaxed fit. The shirt doesn’t ride up or curl up with the large. The medium was much more restrictive. The large does fit loose but only to the point where I breathe better lol. And the back is definitely as cute as it looks in the pictures.

I need this in every color. I absolutely love it, supports my boobs that have seen better days after breastfeeding 2 children, but also works as a top eliminating the need for more layers of clothes. I wear it to the gym and also under my FP dupe jumpsuits. No spilling out of the cups, feel comfortable running in it with the amount of support. Not too compressive but still gives the right amount of “containment.” The straps are also comfortable and not too tight or too lose. Absolutely perfect.

A great brang for price, style, and fit.  I am c/d size cup and feel supported running in this top. Most of the non brands stretch out or do not support when running, jumping, and higher impact. Love this tope and support
Fits true to size. Love the light purple color. Good support even for HITT classes

评论概述: Beer tank tops for busty women
评论详情: They fit perfectly!!  The straps don’t dig into you.  It’s  very sexy while holding you in place and slimming you down.  I plan to get more colors
I love this top. Perfectly holds in my girls. I’m 5’7” 170lbs and a d cup. I do wish it was maybe 1” longer but it still is a nice length and fits great.

I'm a 5'8" 165lbs and wear a 36D and bought the large as was recommended by the size chart. It's supportively snug in the chest but loose around the waist, which I like, but it was not really evident in the pictures that it has a looser fit around the waist. If you have a big chest or a small waist relative to your body size, this might not be the fit for you.
If you have larger breasts or curves not the best item. It’s a pretty tight fit. I got a size up and still felt it was quite snug
Loved it so much. I ordered L since I’m 38B and don’t like it too tight. it fits perfectly and so confortable. Good quality and looked great.
